features: Freedom to move:

Our Majestic Flora Crop Top is feathery light and with its ultra chic design, comes with a simple round-neck and a thick waistband for inbuilt support to help you move seamlessly. It provides high-support, thus suited for a wide range of activities. The subtle print panels will elevate your style game.
Double the Fun:

The fun thing about this top is that you can wear it as a sports bra or as a crop top - style it however you want. The length is longer than a usual sports bra to offer adequate coverage for when you wear it as a top.
Sculpted Goddess:

Our high-waisted Majestic Flora Leggings will give you a sculpted and shapely look, with ultimate comfort and support - they’re truly a confidence booster! The thick waistband print detail, adds to its beauty and offers inbuilt support to your core.
Squat Proof
- The leggings offer maximum coverage and zero transparency so that you can walk, squat, train without any worry! No awkward camel toe, either!
Yay! Yes to Pockets:
Carry your essentials with you - these leggings have convenient side pockets! Ideal for airpods, phones, keys and card holders.
Sweat? What Sweat?
Our set will be your personal sweat manager – wicking away moisture and keeping you feeling fresh, even on the hottest days! Goodbye, awkward sweat patches!
Buttery-Soft Bliss:
Spoil yourself with a buttery-soft feel and ultimate comfort that’ll leave you wondering whether you’re wearing a co-ord set or a cloud.
Customised Comfort:

We offer removable cups with our crop top to provide tailored support, making it your ideal companion for everyday wear. You can choose how you wish to wear it! We are happy to customise the length for you to get your leggings to fit you to perfection! Choose your height tab, while placing the order.
